short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a better experience in chatgpt with table of questions, customize content width and so on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Asked too many questions in a single chatgpt conversation and couldn't find the information you were looking for?
Feeling that the density of information on the page is too low? The width is too narrow resulting in incomplete display of information? Especially code snippets
now the savior comes

☆☆ Features ☆☆
✓ TOQ(Table Of Questions). Generate a catalog of previous questions to quickly navigate through the questions and click to quickly jump to the target location
✓ Customizable Content Width: You can customize the width of the content in your session and it will be persistent.

If you have more questions about chatgpt or what you want to change, you can contact me at wingtaol@gmail.com
